text:
Company: Barker Inc

Role: Assistant Architect

Job Description:
Join our innovative team at Barker Inc as an Assistant Architect, where you will play a crucial role in designing and developing remarkable architectural projects. We are seeking a detail-oriented and creative individual to collaborate with our architects and engineers to bring projects to life.

Responsibilities:

 Assist in designing and developing architectural projects from concept to completion
 Collaborate with architects, engineers, and other stakeholders to ensure project timelines and budgets are met
 Conduct site visits to ensure compliance with design specifications
 Develop and maintain accurate project documentation

Qualifications and Experience:

 Bachelor's degree in Architecture or related field
 2+ years of experience in an architectural role
 Strong knowledge of architectural design principles and practices
 Proficiency in Autodesk Revit and Adobe Creative Suite

Perks and Benefits:
We offer a dynamic work environment, opportunities for professional growth, and a competitive salary range of USD 60,000 to USD 80,000, based on your experience and skills. Additionally, we provide a comprehensive benefits package, including health insurance, retirement savings plan, and paid time off.
